Articles.Content:
Hello!

I\'ve been playing around with launches for about a month now and made a few posts elsewhere, but wanted to post in the obligatory thread here too.

I alllllmost went into astrophysics as my major, really loved Microsoft Space Simulator in spite of all of its flaws, and play most space games far longer than I should. So far, KSP looks like it will be great fun for me, for a very long time.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
welkom aboard and happy explosians and launches hehehehe
